name: EmailCreditNote
description:
Send a credit note via email.

Use this tool to email a credit note to the intended recipient. It's useful for sending invoice adjustments to clients.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the organization for which the credit note is being emailed.

parameters.name: credit_note_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the credit note to be emailed.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the credit note.

parameters.name: customer_id_for_credit_note
parameters.description: Customer ID for whom the credit note is raised. Used to identify the recipient of the email.

value_schema.description: Customer ID of the customer for whom the credit note is raised.

parameters.name: email_attachments
parameters.description: The file paths or URLs of files to attach to the email.

value_schema.description: The files to be attached with the email.

parameters.name: email_content
parameters.description: Details of the email including recipients, subject, and body. Contains 'to_mail_ids' (list of recipient emails), 'cc_mail_ids' (list of CC emails), 'subject' (string up to 1000 chars), and 'body' (string up to 5000 chars).

to_mail_ids.description: The email IDs to which the credit note is to be mailed.

cc_mail_ids.description: The email IDs that have to be copied when the credit note is to be mailed.

subject.description: The subject of the email. Max-length [1000]

body.description: The body of the email. Max-length [5000]

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.
